hanzi-su-wiki:
陰

Значения

Тень, отражение; заволакиваться, смеркаться; тайный; время, момент

Мнемоника

Справа — пасмурность, т.е. сейчас 今 + облака 云. Пасмурность от стены 阝 — тень.

Варианты

阴, 隂

heisig_chinese_memo: The best shade at The Pinnacle is in the shadow of the giant Yin-yang clock tower, or from a rising cloud.
heisig_constituent: shade, pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, now, clock, rising cloud, two, elbow, wall
heisig_story: Just as the sunshine (Frame 1397) represents the masculine principle in nature (Yang), the shade stands for the feminine principle (Yin). Its elements are: pinnacle . . . clock . . . rising cloud.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: shade, yin, negative, sex organs, secret, shadow
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: тень, инь, отрицательный, половые органы, тайна, тень
koohiiStory1: There are three types of shade: 1. natural (a high pinnacle), 2. man-made buildings (a clock tower), 3. meteorological (a cloud).
koohiiStory2: Frosty the snowman is running around the pinnacle, staying in the shade. As he looks at his clock to see how much longer he can last, small clouds rise (steam) from his body. Nooo, Frosty!
jp_example_words:
陰気(いんき): gloom, melancholy
日陰(ひかげ): shadow
陰(かげ): shade, shadow, other side
jp_readingExamples: 陰 (かげ), 陰る (かげ.る)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: This building now has a cloud over it, creating shade.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: This shade is really convenient right now, because it's been such a hot day. Ahh, shade is so nice and cool.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The building that's getting this nice shade is the inn (いん) you're staying at.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture an inn with a cloud right above it right now. Look at the cloud-shaped shade keeping everyone visiting the inn cool and sunburn-free.
Ru_Meaning: shade, yin, negative, sex organs, secret, shadow
Ru_Notes:
По сути аналог: 蔭 (かげ、イン тень, сень, укрытие). У 蔭 есть доп. употребление "благодаря чему-л." (お蔭おかげ), у 陰 — "лунное (женское) начало, инь" (陰いん).
Сравни: 陽 (ひ、ヨウ солнце, свет, положительность, солнечное (мужское) начало, янь).
Ru_Radicals: 二 (два), 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 厶 (значок МУ), 阡

Kanshudo_mnemonic: now I say (侌) the hill (⻖) is in shadow
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Like any other part of the earth the pinnacle has a dark side (yin - from yin yang) when the moon comes out.
humanum_full_description_en:
The original meaning of " yin " refers to the north side of the mountain and the south side of the water, which are all places facing away from the sun, so it is called " yin ". The south of the mountain and the north of the water are places where the sun shines, so it is called " Yang ".

From the " Fu and more with the mountain-related" words, and " Yin " from " now " from the " cloud ", " Today " is a sound character, from the " cloud " possibly because of cloudy weather is called 'cloudy' sake . Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning to respect the clock of the heavenly king: "Yin and Yang of Jianghan", which means the south and north of the Yangtze River and Han River.栱伯盨: "Its yin and its yang, to requisition for action." Also used as a place name.

Jane Chu's " negative " word is not from the " Fu " direct writing " Yin ", "Guodian Slips. "Tai Yi Shui Water" Jane 2: "It is to become a qi." "Ai" means "yin and yang". "Said Wen": "Yin, dark. The water is in the south, and the mountain is in the north. From 𨸏non-sound."
humanum_short_description_en: " Yin " starts with the sound of " Fu " and "侌". The original meaning refers to the north of the mountain and the south of the water. They are all places facing away from the sun, so it is called " Yin ".
humanum_full_description:
「陰」的本義指山的北面，水的南面，皆是背向陽光之處，故稱「陰」。而山的南面，水的北面，是陽光照射之地，故稱「陽」。

　　從「阜」的字多與山有關，而「侌」從「今」從「云」，「今」是聲符，從「云」可能是因為多云的天氣即稱為「陰天」的緣故。金文用作本義，敬事天王鐘：「江漢之陰陽」，表示長江、漢水的南面和北面。㠱伯盨：「其陰其陽，以征以行。」又用作地名。

　　楚簡的「陰」字不從「阜」，直接寫作「侌」，《郭店楚簡．太一生水》簡2：「是以成侌昜。」「侌昜」即「陰陽」。《說文》：「陰，闇也。水之南，山之北也。从𨸏侌聲。」
humanum_short_description: 「陰」從「阜」，「侌」聲，本義指山的北面，水的南面，皆是背向陽光之處，故稱「陰」。

Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 陽
Ideographic: The shaded side of a hill 阝; 侌 provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
    • 侌 [ yīn ]
①中國古代哲學認爲宇宙中通貫所有物質的兩大對立面諸一，與“陽”相對：陰陽。一陰一陽謂之道。陰差陽錯。陰盛陽衰。陰虛生熱。
②指“月亮”：太陰(月亮)。陰曆。
③帶負電的：陰電。陰極。陰離子。
④雲層較厚，遮住陽光：陰沉。陰雨。陰鬱(亦指憂鬱，不開朗)。陰霾。
⑤不見陽光，亦指不見陽光的地方：陰面。陰乾(gān)。陰涼，陰影。山陰(山的北面，水的南面)。碑陰(碑的背面)。
⑥不露出表面的，暗中的：陰溝。陰通(祕密往來)。陰私。陰功(ａ．暗中做的好事；b．迷信指被陰間記功的好事)。
⑦背地搗鬼，險惡：陰謀。陰毒。
⑧指冥間：陰間。陰司。陰曹地府。
⑨凹進的：陰文圖章。陰識(即陰文)。
⑩指時間：光陰。惜寸陰。
⑾生殖器：陰部。陰道。陰莖。陰囊。
⑿姓氏。

「 陰 」的本義指山的北面，水的南面，皆是背向陽光之處，故稱「 陰 」。而山的南面，水的北面，是陽光照射之地，故稱「 陽 」。 從「 阜 」的字多與山有關，而「 侌 」從「 今 」從「 云 」，「 今 」是聲符，從「 云 」可能是因為多云的天氣即稱為「陰天」的緣故。金文用作本義，敬事天王鐘：「江漢之陰陽」，表示長江、漢水的南面和北面。㠱伯盨：「其陰其陽，以征以行。」又用作地名。 楚簡的「 陰 」字不從「 阜 」，直接寫作「 侌 」，《郭店楚簡．太一生水》簡2：「是以成侌昜。」「侌昜」即「陰陽」。《說文》：「陰，闇也。水之南，山之北也。从𨸏侌聲。」
The original meaning of " yin" refers to the north side of the mountain and the south side of the water, which are all places facing away from the sun, so it is called " yin". The south of the mountain and the north of the water are places where the sun shines, so it is called " Yang". From the " Fu and more with the mountain-related" words, and " Yin" from " now" from the " cloud", " Today" is a sound character, from the " cloud" possibly because of cloudy weather is called 'cloudy' sake . Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning to respect the clock of the heavenly king: "Yin and Yang of Jianghan", which means the south and north of the Yangtze River and Han River.栱伯盨: "Its yin and its yang, to requisition for action." Also used as a place name. Jane Chu's " negative" word is not from the " Fu" direct writing " Yin", "Guodian Slips. "Tai Yi Shui Water" Jane 2: "It is to become a qi." "Ai" means "yin and yang". "Said Wen": "Yin, dark. The water is in the south, and the mountain is in the north. From 𨸏non-sound."

yīn
见“阴”。

陰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīn］
［《廣韻》於金切，平侵，影。］
“侌1”的今字。“1”的今字。“阴1”的繁体字。亦作“阥1”。亦作“隂1”。亦作“霒1”。亦作“霠1”。
(1)水的南面或山的北面。
(2)泛指北面。
(3)不见阳光的地方。
(4)幽暗，昏暗。
(5)背面。
(6)凹进的。
(7)阴影。
(8)日影。
(9)借指光阴。
(10)天空中十分之八以上的部分被中低云量占住叫做阴。
(11)指云块。
(12)冥冥之中。借指鬼神。
(13)夜。参见“陰陽”。
(14)雨。
(15)阴湿；润泽。
(16)水。
(17)负。与“正”相对。
(18)今指带负电的。
(19)隐藏；不露在外面的。
(20)暗暗地；偷偷地。
(21)阴险。
(22)脸色阴沉不悦貌。
(23)熄灭；哑。
(24)冷，寒冷。
(25)指秋冬季节。
(26)月亮。
(27)小；弱小。
(28)指小人，人格卑鄙的人。
(29)偶数。
(30

陰字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　陰； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1353第06
〔古文〕霒侌???瘖【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】於今切【正韻】於禽切，?音音。【說文】闇也。【釋名】陰，蔭也，氣在內奧蔭也。【玉篇】幽無形，深難測謂之陰。【易·坤卦】陰雖有美含之，以從王事，弗敢成也。地道也，妻道也，臣道也。【禮·月令】百官靜事毋?，以定晏陰之所成。又【周禮·天官·內宰】以陰禮敎六宮。【註】陰禮，婦人之禮。又【內小臣】掌王之陰事陰令。又【地官·大司徒】以陰禮敎親，則民不怨。【註】陰禮，謂男女之禮。　又陰晴。【詩·邶風】曀曀其陰。【又】以陰以雨。　又【說文】山之北也。【書·禹貢】南至于華陰。　又【說文】水之南也。【前漢·地理志】河東郡汾陰縣。【註】介山在南。　又【玉篇】影也。【晉書·陶侃傳】大禹惜寸陰，吾輩當惜分陰。　又【正字通】?背曰陰。楊修解曹娥?陰八字。　又【前漢·郊祀歌】靈之至，慶陰陰。【註】師古曰：言垂陰覆徧於下。　又【玉篇】默也。【戰國策】齊秦之交陰合。　又【詩·秦風】陰靷鋈續。【傳】陰，揜軓也。【釋名】陰，蔭也。橫側車前

yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīn］
["Guangyun" Yu Jinqie, flat invasion, shadow. ]
The present character of "侌1". The present character of "1". Traditional characters for "阴1". Also known as "阥1". Also known as "Yin 1". Also known as "霒1". Also known as "霠1".
(1) The south of the water or the north of the mountain.
(2) Refers to the north in general.
(3) A place where there is no sunlight.
(4) Dim and dim.
(5) The back.
(6) Recessed.
(7) Shadows.
(8) Sun shadow.
(9) By referring to time.
(10) More than eight-tenths of the sky is occupied by medium and low cloud cover and is called overcast.
(11) Refers to cloud blocks.
(12) In the dark. By referring to ghosts and gods.
(13) Night. See "yin and yang".
(14) Rain.
(15) Humidity; moisturizing.
(16) Water.
(17) Negative. Contrast with "positive".
(18) Today refers to negatively charged.
(19) Hidden; not exposed.
(20) Secretly; secretly.
(21) Sinister.
(22) The face is gloomy and unhappy.
(23) Extinguished; dumb.
(24) Cold, cold.
(25) Refers to the autumn and winter seasons.
(26) The moon.
(27) Small; weak.
(28) Refers to the villain, a person with a mean personality.
(29) Even number.

Old glyph
yin
Name meaning
Nothing.
yīn, yìn, ān
вм. 阴
Radicals: 阝, 今, 云  (building, now, cloud)
Meaning Mnemonic
This building now has a cloud over it, creating shade.
This shade is really convenient right now, because it's been such a hot day. Ahh, shade is so nice and cool.
Reading Mnemonic
The building that's getting this nice shade is the inn (いん) you're staying at.
Picture an inn with a cloud right above it right now. Look at the cloud-shaped shade keeping everyone visiting the inn cool and sunburn-free.

Examples: 陰 (かげ), 陰る (かげ.る)
二 (два), 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 厶 (значок МУ), 阡
По сути аналог: 蔭 (かげ、イン тень, сень, укрытие). У 蔭 есть доп. употребление "благодаря чему-л." (お蔭おかげ), у 陰 — "лунное (женское) начало, инь" (陰いん).
Сравни: 陽 (ひ、ヨウ солнце, свет, положительность, солнечное (мужское) начало, янь).
